actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The veteran makes two Longsword attacks and two Shortsword attacks, or it makes three Longsword attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 7 (1d8+3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10+3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 6 (1d6+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 7 (1d10+2) piercing damage.
